Method.Doc: Get the fields of all statements of an agreement

XSelect.XField: st.id, st.uuid, st.code as statement_code, st.field as statement_field, stl.statement as statement, stl.name as statement_name, stl.description as statement_description, stt.code as statement_type_code, sttl.name as statement_type_name, sttl.description as statement_type_description, st.expire_date_expression

XFrom.XTable: fw_agreement_statement st INNER JOIN fw_agreement_statement_lang stl ON (stl.id = st.id AND stl.lang='{param->_lang}') INNER JOIN fw_agreement_statement_type stt ON (stt.id = st.id_agreement_statement_type) INNER JOIN fw_agreement_statement_type_lang sttl ON (sttl.id = stt.id AND sttl.lang='{param->_lang}')
